We are looking to launch a new VPS product soon.

We have been doing tests for the past week and it's ready for beta test at the moment.

We are looking for volunteers to sign up with our billing system and beta test our new VPS product.

In return, if you'd like to keep the VPS, the first month will be free PLUS your second month's invoice will be 50% discounted.

The product has these specs:

OpenVZ Virtualization
4 vCPU
6GB Memory
30GB HDD (RAID10 with 10K Drives)
2TB Monthly Traffic Limit
4Gbps Uplink (4 x 1Gbps Load Balanced)
1 IPv4 Address
No IPv6 at the moment
Located in Dallas, TX in Incero's facility

Node Specs:

Dual E5 2620 CPU
384GB Memory
8 x 10K Drives RAID10

To sign up for beta test, please PM me and I'll get you the sign up link.

You don't need to run ServerBear since it's already done. Please test the network, the performance by real world applications.

Please do not share the brand's name or website here, yet. Since it's not operational, yet.

Thank you for your interest.

Oktay
